about_the_game:
Six yakuza legends swear into your Clan Creator family, the tower defense game within Yakuza 6! This DLC pack includes six powerful Super Super Rare cards plus, additional EXP boots and yen for the main game.

Clan Creator Cards included:

Clan Creator Special Leader Daigo Dojima (SSR)
Has the unique skill “Sixth Chairman Dignity” - increases the deployment gauge by 150.

Clan Creator Special Leader Goro Majima (SSR)
Has the unique skill “Demonfire Slash” - inflicts major damage and stun enemies in range.

Clan Creator Special Leader Kazuma Kiryu (SSR)
Has the unique skill “Dragon of Dojima” - causes all allies hit 50% harder for 10 seconds and suffer no knockback.

Makoto Date Card (SSR)
Has the unique skill “Muscle Party” - causes all allies to take no damage for 10 seconds.

Clan Creator Special Leader Shun Akiyama (SSR)
Has the unique skill “Essence of Stability” - causes all allies to enter a state of frenzied attack for 10 seconds.

Clan Creator Special Leader Taiga Saejima (SSR)
Has the unique skill “Woodsman Chop” - inflicts major damage and stun enemies in range.

Also included are the following bonus items for the main game:
  • 100,000 yen
  • 2x Rainbow Bun (Each grants 500x to Kiryu's XP)
  • Staminan Royale (Replenishes Health and Heat)
